column4: longitudeB are given in decimal degrees e.g. 41.152712

column1: #path direction is either "bi" or "uni". For "uni" the direction is from the first to the second point
#kinetic coefficient is given with 3 decimal places e.g. 0.002. When not given
#wind direction - the wind direction in degrees e.g. 220. When not given
#wind speed - the wind speed in m/s with one decimal place e.g. 1. When not given
